title: HTML5
description: The structure of the web. Learn semantic markup and accessibility.

title: CSS3
description: Style and layout. Master Flexbox, Grid, and responsive design.

title: JavaScript
description: The language of the web. DOM manipulation, ES6+, and logic.

title: Java
description: Object-oriented programming. Build robust backend systems.

title: Python
description: Data science and automation. Clean syntax for powerful logic.

title: React
description: Building User Interfaces. Components, JSX, and Virtual DOM.

title: SQL
description: Database management. Query, filter, and analyze data.

title: Git & GitHub
description: Version control. Collaborate and manage code history.

title: Methodology
description: SDLC, Agile, Scrum, and Waterfall. Learn how teams build software.
